```{r}
library(MASS)

R <- 5 
Ns <- c(100,200,300,400,500)
Rhos <- c(seq(0,1, by = 0.1))
mu1 <- 0
mu2 <- 0
s1 <- 1
s2 <- 1

mu <- c(mu1,mu2)


scatter <- vector(mode = "list", length = R*length(Ns)*length(Rhos))
IDs <- vector(mode = "list", length = R*length(Ns)*length(Rhos))
index = 1
for(i in 1:R){
  for(j in Ns){
    for(r in Rhos){
      sigma <- matrix(c(s1^2, s1*s2*r, s1*s2*r, s2^2),2)
      scatter[[index]] <- mvrnorm(j, mu = mu, Sigma = sigma ) # from MASS package
      index = index + 1
    }
  }
}
  

colnames(scatter1) <- c("X1","X2")

plot(scatter[[25]])

```
